level.text: 403.1 The President and Chief Executive Officer or designee shall be the finalpproving authority for all bookings, whether negotiated by Destination DC or byhe Authority.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 29 DCR 259, 261 (January 15, 1982); asmended by Final Rulemaking published at 50 DCR 3035 (April 18, 2003); asmended by Final Rulemaking published at 60 DCR 8962 (June 14, 2013).
